# oxc/approx-constant

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallows the use of approximate constants, instead preferring the use of the constants in the `Math` object.

### Why is this bad?

Approximate constants are not as accurate as the constants in the `Math` object.

### Example
```javascript
```
